triples.name: Perceiver
triples.relevance: Otter builds upon Flamingo with Perceiver architecture for processing multimodal inputs efficiently.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: Otter is a Large Multimodal Model extending LLM capabilities to vision and video understanding.

triples.name: In-context learning
triples.relevance: The paper proposes using both textual and visual in-context examples to enhance instruction following capability.

triples.name: Multimodal learning
triples.relevance: Otter seamlessly processes multimodal inputs including text, images, and video content.

triples.name: Transfer learning
triples.relevance: Instruction tuning builds on transfer learning to adapt the pre-trained model for instruction following.

triples.name: Fine-tuning
triples.relevance: Instruction tuning is a form of fine-tuning that adapts the model to follow user instructions.

triples.name: Computer vision
triples.relevance: Video and multi-image understanding are core computer vision tasks that Otter addresses.

triples.name: Image classification
triples.relevance: Image classification is a fundamental task enabled by Otter's vision understanding capabilities.
